ygData.subject: Re: Raw deal - need help!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Shoot, I lost everything I had on my main character due to a bug in befallen, I was told I MIGHT get a leg up kit (!) That was sunday, this is thursday, so
ygData.messageBody:
>From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>
>I feel as though I'm getting the raw end of the deal from Verant. I lost 10
>P and an Opalline earring (paid 25 P for it) off an alt character, due to
>yet another bug/glitch with the boat. I've done everything I can possibly
>think of, (/tell, /shout, /petition, /bug, /feedback, and email directly to
>a GM at the suggestion of a Guide) to get this equipment restored. And I've
>done them all numerous times and still nothing!
>


Shoot, I lost everything I had on my main character due to a bug
in befallen, I was told I MIGHT get a leg up kit (!)

That was sunday, this is thursday, so far no contact from V, they
took my e-mail address .... but nothing

In that time I sold a few items from my bank storage, started a
character specifically to make money, leveled him to 4, and passed
the <20 pp I had to him. Then started pottery, I now have almost
enough to re-equip, but it's been a long, fairly tedious time
that I COULD HAVE BEEN PLAYING!!!

leg up kit? I don't need no stinkin' leg up kit!!!
